PLAY.TITLE: As You Like It

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: DUKE FREDERICK, his brother, an usurper of his dominions.

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: lords attending on the banished duke.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: LE BEAU, a courtier attending upon Frederick.

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: sons of Sir Rowland de Boys.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: WILLIAM, a country fellow in love with Audrey.
ROSALIND, daughter to the banished duke.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Oliver's house; Duke Frederick's court; and the Forest of Arden.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Orchard of Oliver's house.
SCENE II. Lawn before the Duke's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter DUKE FREDERICK, Lords, ORLANDO,
CHARLES, and Attendants
Exeunt DUKE FREDERICK, train, and LE BEAU

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROSALIND
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Giving him a chain from her neck

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A room in the palace.
SCENE I. The Forest of Arden.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DUKE SENIOR, AMIENS, and two or three Lords,
like foresters

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A room in the palace.
SCENE IV. The Forest of Arden.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter ROSALIND for Ganymede, CELIA for Aliena,
and TOUCHSTONE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. The forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
A table set out. Enter DUKE SENIOR, AMIENS, and
Lords like outlaws
Enter ORLANDO, with his sword drawn

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A room in the palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE FREDERICK, Lords, and OLIVER

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ROSALIND, with a paper, reading

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter TOUCHSTONE and AUDREY; JAQUES behind

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another part of the forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ROSALIND, CELIA, and CORIN, behind

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Forester
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: The rest shall bear this burden

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DUKE SENIOR, AMIENS, JAQUES, ORLANDO, OLIVER,
and CELIA
